result.eng: I agree with you completely and utterly.
result.ga: Aontaím go huile agus go hiomlán leat
result.orig: Aontaím go huile agus go hiomlán leat
result.html: Aontaím go huile agus go hiomlán leatI agree with you completely and utterly.
result.ponchtml: Aontaím go huile agus go hiomlán leatI agree with you completely and utterly.

result.eng: She concentrated completely on the work.
result.ga: Dhírigh sé go huile agus go hiomlán ar an obair
result.orig: Dhírigh sé go huile agus go hiomlán ar an obair
result.html: Dhírigh sé go huile agus go hiomlán ar an obairShe concentrated completely on the work.
result.ponchtml: Ḋíriġ sé go huile agus go hiomlán ar an obairShe concentrated completely on the work.

result.ga: Tá an scéal seo go hiomlán cumtha
result.orig: Tá an scéal seo go hiomlán cumtha
result.html: Tá an scéal seo go hiomlán cumthaThis story is completely fictional.
result.ponchtml: Tá an scéal seo go hiomlán cumṫaThis story is completely fictional.

result.eng: I have it completely under control.
result.ga: Tá sé go hiomlán faoi smacht agam
result.orig: Tá sé go hiomlán faoi smacht agam
result.html: Tá sé go hiomlán faoi smacht agamI have it completely under control.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé go hiomlán faoi smaċt agamI have it completely under control.

result.ga: Tá sé go hiomlán i nGaeilge
result.orig: Tá sé go hiomlán i nGaeilge
result.html: Tá sé go hiomlán i nGaeilgeIt is completely in Irish.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé go hiomlán i nGaeilgeIt is completely in Irish.

result.eng: He will be completely satisfied with it.
result.html: Beidh sé lán-sásta leisHe will be completely satisfied with it.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ sé lán-sásta leisHe will be completely satisfied with it.

result.eng: Although we didn't fall out completely, the friendship cooled off.
result.ga: Cé nár thiteamar amach le chéile ar fad tháinig fuacht ar an gcairdeas
result.orig: Cé nár thiteamar amach le chéile ar fad tháinig fuacht ar an gcairdeas
result.html: Cé nár thiteamar amach le chéile ar fad tháinig fuacht ar an gcairdeasAlthough we didn't fall out completely, the friendship cooled off.
result.ponchtml: Cé nár ṫiteamar amaċ le ċéile ar fad ṫáinig fuaċt ar an gcairdeasAlthough we didn't fall out completely, the friendship cooled off.

result.html: Chaill sé a mheabhair glanHe lost his mind completely.
result.ponchtml: Ċaill sé a ṁeaḃair glanHe lost his mind completely.
